sentence: But Trump's risker endorsement in the state is for Rep. Madison Cawthorn's reelection.
title: The most interesting Republican primaries of 2022

sentence: The Tar Heel State is, however, proving troublesome in other ways after a former district staff member for Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) accused the 26-year-old lawmaker of improperly firing her after denying family and medical leave.
author: Alexis Simendinger
title: The Hill's Morning Report  Biden administration makes huge election year decision

sentence: An Arizona judge threw out a measure to ban Republican Reps. Andy Biggs and Paul Gosar, as well as state Rep. Mark Finchem (who is running for Arizona secretary of state) last month, and efforts against Reps. Madison Cawthorn (R-NC) and Jim Banks (R-IN) failed as well.
author: Virginia Aabram
title: Bid to erase Marjorie Taylor Greene from ballot fails
